file_content.text: I'm going to win. I'm gonna be Lord Zash's apprentice.
You're all deceived--you're deceived if you think the Sith are gonna let us live. You really think they brought us here to test us?
Psychological torture--that's what it is. For their own sick pleasure!
Watch what you say and where you say it--unless you want the whole Academy to know you're a Republic bootlicker.
I don't care. If it weren't for the Empire, I wouldn't be here and wouldn't have to tolerate the abuse.
Would you like it better if I turned you in to Harkun as a Republic spy, hmm? I didn't think so.
Fight! Fight! Fight!
This should be fun to watch.
Fight! Fight! Fight! Fight!
This should be fun to watch.
Yeah, Niloc--let's settle this right here.
Can't you see that's exactly what the overseer wants? He wants us to kill each other one by one!
Oh, and a Jedi would never try to hurt anybody, is that it?
Stop fighting. We're in this together. We only play into Harkun's hands if we fight.
Cease this squabbling.
Are you kidding? The Sith don't work together! They divide and conquer. They kill. It's the Jedi that are--
Heh. A Jedi changed his nappies as a baby and now he can't get enough of 'em.
Shut up, Gerr! What do you know? I've been to Coruscant, I've met Jedi. And I've seen what the Sith can do too.
When the Sith took my homeworld in the war, they took everything so they could set up bases and build weapons. They killed my father and sold us as slaves!
Tough.
That's right.
They should've killed you too. It would have spared me this conversation.
Too bad they let you live.
That's right we should have. We should wipe out the whole lot of them.
I'm sorry.
I don't believe it! So what if his homeworld was taken? That's war.
The Jedi drove us from the galaxy a thousand years ago. If it weren't for the Emperor, the Sith would be extinct. They want us all dead.
The Jedi are cold. When Jedi killed my brother, there was no hate, no passion. They tossed him aside like a stray dog. Like my brother wasn't even a person.
Your rage over your brother's death will make you strong. Use it to defeat the Jedi.
Your anger is an asset.
You'll live.
That's awful.
What about you? Which side are you on? You a Republic bootlicker like him?
The Jedi will all die--as will you fools. Hopefully by my hand.
You're all idiots.
Maybe the bootlicker will, but I'm Sith. I will have my revenge on the Jedi.
Just stay out of my way.
Just don't cross me.
You're worthless.
It was nice knowing you.
Nice to know you.
You're just like the Sith. You're one of them.
I am Sith through and through and nobody better question it.
I serve the dark side.
See, Niloc, no one agrees with you. You'd better watch your back.
I didn't expect you brutes to understand--life outside this Empire is better because of the Jedi. If you ever get off this rock, you'll see.
Yeah, get out of here, bootlicker!
Oh--I thought you might like to have this. It's a medpac--I stole it out of the old bootlicker's footlocker. Keep you alive a little longer, right?
His loss is my gain. Give it here.
I won't refuse.
That's the spirit! Sith take all.
I just did it to get under Niloc's skin.
This was its own reward.
It's yours.
Heh heh. I've got my own. Take it. I insist.
Watch out, Harkun! We're going straight to the top! The Empire is ours!
I think Niloc's right--the Sith are vicious. The sooner I'm out of here, the better.
The Sith are wrong.
Then you'd better keep your distance from now on. I don't want anything to do with Republic scum and Jedi sympathizers.
Thanks. I know I shouldn't have lost my temper with Gerr like that--he just really knows how to get under people's skin.
Look, I want you to have this. It's not worth much here, but if you ever get off this rock, you might find some use for it.
My father gave it to me. I have a feeling I'm not going to last much longer here. I want you to have it.
I am most grateful. I will take good care of it.
Thank you.
It's nothing really. A sign of friendship.
Hey, I only did it to anger Gerr.
I didn't like that guy.
Whatever your reason, I appreciate the friendship.
Keep it.
Please, I insist--as a sign of friendship.
And good luck with the trials. Don't let Harkun get the better of you.
What's this?
Niloc was spreading lies about the Empire, and I called him on it.
I only said I was here against my will, same as everyone else.
I'm going to win. I'm gonna be Lord Zash's apprentice.
